SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - In general, how confident are you that you can: Avoid serious problems due to hypoglycemia?

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: HCS01-Catch Before Sugars Get Too Low
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - In general, how confident are you that you can: Catch and respond to hypoglycemia before your blood sugars get too low?
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: HCS01-Catch Before Sugars Get Too Low
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HCS - Catch Before Sugars Get Too Low

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: HCS01-Continue to Do Things Really Want
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - In general, how confident are you that you can: Continue to do the things you really want to do in your life, despite the risks of hypoglycemia?
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: HCS01-Continue to Do Things Really Want
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HCS - Continue to Do Things Really Want

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - Mean HCS score.
Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - How confident are you that you can stay safe from serious problems with hypoglycemia: When you are alone?
Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - How confident are you that you can stay safe from serious problems with hypoglycemia: When you are driving?
Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - How confident are you that you can stay safe from serious problems with hypoglycemia: When you are exercising?

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: HCS01-When You Are in Social Situations
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - How confident are you that you can stay safe from serious problems with hypoglycemia: When you are in social situations?
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: HCS01-When You Are in Social Situations
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HCS - When You Are in Social Situations

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - How confident are you that you can stay safe from serious problems with hypoglycemia: When you are sleeping?

Hypoglycemic Confidence Scale - If you have a spouse or partner: What is your best guess about how confident your spouse or partner feels about your ability to avoid serious problems due to hypoglycemia?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: HCS - Your Ability to Avoid Problems
